_sText:
The weapon of "mass destruction" has finally been realeased. Updates! Muzzle flash added Artillery only moves when you hold the key ;)

This prefab can be used in your maps. You may also Modify the artillery. This vmf shows you what is possible with hammer and there are many ways to make different artillery's/cannons, in fact the possibilities are endless. Soon i hope to see lots of maps with these kind of machinery in it. And see other ideas. And when there are more maps off this there wil be a categorie CM (Cannon_maps) Here are the keys to control it. To steer the artillery use: W A S D To shoot the canisters use: Left mouse button To exit the artillery use : E or jump
